text: Strangeways is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * David Strangeways, British officer involved with allied deceptions during World War II * James Strangeways, English politician of the 15th century * Thomas Strangeways, British physician and founder of Strangeways Research Laboratory ==Fictional characters== * Nigel Strangeways, a fictional detective in works of Cecil Day-Lewis writing as Nicholas Blake
title: Strangeways (surname)
